author: Lunovox

game.author: MeseCraft
game.name: mesecraft
game.short_description: Work in Progress. The best game for Minetest. A survival game with new depth, mechanics, biomes, mobs and many essential additions. Has a focus on being fun, user-friendly, stable, and minimalist but featured.
game.title: MeseCraft

game.name: regnum
game.short_description: Fight monsters, collect XP, craft battleaxes, armor, guns and lots more.
game.title: Regnum

game.author: Casimir
game.name: voxelgarden
game.short_description: A classic game for exploring, survival and building. Maintained by rudzik8
game.title: Voxelgarden

game.author: hilol
game.name: epic_combat
game.short_description: Fight your enemies with various weapons and protect yourself with distinct sets of Armour, whilst sharpening your skills in PVP and PVE.
game.title: Epic Combat

game.author: bell07
game.name: whynot_game
game.short_description: Aims to get all existing high quality mods working together
game.title: WhyNot?

game.author: Kimapr
game.name: nonsensical_skyblock
game.short_description: skyblock game BASED on crafting. no quest cringe! bonemeal go brrrr
game.title: Nonsensical Skyblock

game.name: regnum2
game.short_description: This is the second part of Regnum
game.title: Regnum 2

game.author: EmptyStar
game.name: asuna
game.short_description: A vibrant world of beautiful biomes. Explore, discover, create.
game.title: Asuna

game.author: Luanti
game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
# [COMPUTING][mod_computing] [![luanti_icon]][luanti_link] Add multiple computing devices such as: Smartphones and Desktops. It supports several apps integrated by other mods. ![screenshot_general] Badge: [![ContentDB_en_icon]][ContentDB_en_link] [![DownloadsCDB_en_icon]][DownloadsCDB_en_link] ----------------------------------------- ## üéÅ **Added items:** | Item | Descryption | | :--: | :-- | | üì±
```Smartphone``` | Mobile device that displays the server date and time. | ----------------------------------------- ## üì¶ **Depends:** | Mod Name | Type | Descryption | | :--: | :--: | :-- | | [default][minetest_game] | Mandatory | **Minetest Game** Included. | | [keys][minetest_game] | Mandatory | **Minetest Game** Included. | | [components][mod_components] | Optional | It makes the recipe for computational devices more realistic and it is harder to get the ingredients to craft them. | ----------------------------------------- ## üìú **License:** * [![license_code_icon]][license_code_link] * [![license_media_icon]][license_media_link] See more details in wiki: [![wiki_en_icon]][wiki_en_link] [![wiki_pt_icon]][wiki_pt_link] ----------------------------------------- ## üëë **Developers:** * Lunovox Heavenfinder: [E-Mail](mailto:lunovox@disroot.org), [Social Web](https://qoto.org/@lunovox), [WebChat](https://cloud.disroot.org/call/9aa2t7ib), [XMPP](https://conversations.im/i/lunovox@disroot.org?omemo-sid-633434523=97fce936651d6c3a28ca303ad5955ea2f1ab57fd5cd0769f04aebef6dd4cba79), [More Contacts](https://libreplanet.org/wiki/User:Lunovox) ----------------------------------------- ## üíæ **Downloads:** * [Stable Versions][download_stable] : There are several versions in different stages of completion. Usually recommended for servers because they are more secure. * [Git Repository (Unstable)][download_repository] : It is the version currently under construction. There may be some stability if used on servers. It is only recommended for testers and mod developers. ----------------------------------------- ## ‚öôÔ∏è **Settings:** In **minetest.conf** file: You don't need to do any of these presets mentioned below to make this mod work. But it's worth knowing the configuration values ‚Äã‚Äãin case you want to directly change the ````minetest.conf```` file. | Settings | Descryption | | :-- | :-- | | ````computing.debug = ```` | If show debug info of this mod. Only util to developers. Default: ````false````. | | ````computing.smartphone_recipe = ```` | If enabled will display the recipe so players can craft their own smart phone. Default: ````true````. | ----------------------------------------- ## üëÑ **Translates:** See more details in file: [locale/README.md][read_internacionalizaton] ----------------------------------------- ## üìÄ **Mods with Intregrated Apps:** These mods are not mandatory. But, because they are integrated into the 'computing' mod, they extend the functionality. | Mod Name | Descryption | | :--: | :-- | | [correio][mod_correio] | Add an app that allows you to read emails. | | [minertrade][mod_minertrade] | Add an app that allows you to carry out banking operations, with: balance, statement, and money transfers. | | [lunoschedule][mod_lunoschedule] | Add an app that displays a calendar with four seasons of 28 days each. | | [soundchat][mod_soundchat] | Add applications that allow you to: configure the chat sound (ideal for those with ADHD), view the conversation history (Ideal for those who play luanti/minetest on their cell phones), start a local chat (between players located close to each other on the map), start a private player-to-player chat with infinite distances). | ----------------------------------------- ## üìé **API of Integration:** See more details in file: [docs/API_Integration.md][read_api_integration]
